original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 294.50/296 to dollar, bond and bill yields steady at open
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka spot US dollar opened at 294.50/296.00 rupees and the bonds were steady on Thursday, dealers said.
The Spot US dollar closed at 294.0/295.50 rupees rupees on Thursday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 23.40/60 percent unchanged from a day earlier.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 24.30/60 percent steady from 24.15/25.30 percent from last close.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 was quoted at 26.50/27.00. percent, steady from 26.75/27.00percent on Thursday.
A three-month maturing bill was quoted at 22.00/75 percent down from 22.75/23.00 percent from the last close.
A six-month maturing bill was quoted at 20.00/30 percent down from 21.00/30 percent from its last close.
